message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate it, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer it to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to go to $90. If you're not able to accept that, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.

I understand that $105 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll love the product at this price!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $100 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm going to stick with my offer of $90. If you're not willing to go lower, I'm going to have to buy from John.
I understand that $100 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer it to you for $97. This is my last offer, and I'm really hoping you'll take it!
